tool_description: An API to convert different coin types
name: Coin Conversor
title: Coin Conversor

api_list.name: List currencies
api_list.description: List all available currencies as they will be used to convert
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://coin-conversor.p.rapidapi.com/convert/currencies"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "coin-conversor.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Convert
api_list.description: Convert a value from one currency to another
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://coin-conversor.p.rapidapi.com/convert/BRL/USD/200"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "coin-conversor.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://coin-conversor.p.rapidapi.com/convert/{origin}/{destination}/{value}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "coin-conversor.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
